attributes.action: allow the building of the Mega Mosque and stop Newham council from illegally occupying private property of the mosque.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Newham council has time and again rejected the planning permission for the Mosque without any reason whatsoever and thought they can play cat and mouse with the peaceful and humble Muslims of Tablighi Jamaat. They also thought they can play funny jokes buy offering £1 to buy a 1/3 of the land which is Absolutely disgraceful. The dirty tricks do not stop there. They are now considering forceful takeover of the land. We all must stand up against this ridiculous proposition.

rejection.details: This is an issue for your local authority. Please contact them directly.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
